item.title: Thank you Gavin Andresen for showing the world that you shouldn't rely on a signature verification done on a computer you don't control. * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:
Thank you Gavin Andresen for showing the world that you shouldn't rely on a signature verification done on a computer you don't control. * /r/Bitcoin

257 points and 167 comments so far on reddit

item.title: One of Ripple's Early Supporters is Now Using Ethereum to Rethink Banking - CoinDesk
item.description:
One of Ripple's Early Supporters is Now Using Ethereum to Rethink Banking - CoinDesk

One of the first banks to become involved in the blockchain space, German online bank Fidor has long been quiet about the shifts in its tech strategy even as more financial incumbents have followed in its footsteps through investments and partnerships. Just how early was Fidor?

item.title: OpenBazaar's 'Ambitious Destination' - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
OpenBazaar's 'Ambitious Destination' - Bitcoinist.net

The OpenBazaar team has Also read: BitcoinAverage: Craig Wright Can't Keep Bitcoin Down For Long released its roadmap to the public via a Medium blog post and a picture of the company Trello board. The decentralized marketplace had "received a better than expected response," and has gained visitors from all across the globe.

item.title: Bitfinex Platform and Mobile App Receive Significant Updates
item.description:
Bitfinex Platform and Mobile App Receive Significant Updates

Bitfinex is one of the most popular Bitcoin exchanges in the world, and the developers have recently unveiled their latest batch of updates for the platform. New security features have been added, and the Bitfinex app underwent some minor changes as well.

item.title: NATO Shows Interest in Military Applications of Blockchains
item.description:
NATO Shows Interest in Military Applications of Blockchains

On the 25th of April, NATO Communications and Information (NCI) Agency released details regarding the 2106 Innovation Challenge, which provides a venue for innovators to showcase their state-of-the-art military-focused IT solutions. This year's Innovation Challenge focuses on four categories: Cyber Defense, Internet of Things, Military application of Blockchains, Cognitive computing and machine learning.

item.title: Technology and Choice #06, Chadrick Mahaffey on Crowd Founding Principles
item.description:
Technology and Choice #06, Chadrick Mahaffey on Crowd Founding Principles

In this Episode Chadrick Mahaffey is a software developer and fan of the SAFE Network. For years he's been working to understand organization principles so as to evolve a way that people can "Labor in Freedom."

item.title: What Makes The DAO Concept So Appealing?
item.description:
What Makes The DAO Concept So Appealing?

A lot of people have been wondering what the power of the DAO principle holds exactly, and how useful this will be to other Ethereum users. Although not everyone in the world will create their own DAO n the future, there are a lot of advantages to this concept, to say the least.

item.title: Ethereum DAO Crowdsale, the Most Successful Crowdfunding Campaign - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum DAO Crowdsale, the Most Successful Crowdfunding Campaign - NEWSBTC

The Ethereum DAO crowdsale is now one of the most successful crowdfunding campaign till date. Read more... Ethereum DAO token crowdsale is the best performing crowdfunding campaign so far! The platform has raised over $34.45 million in less than 15 days of launch.

item.title: Target Is Hiring an Expert Who Understands Bitcoin - Bitcoin News
item.description:
Target Is Hiring an Expert Who Understands Bitcoin - Bitcoin News

Target is changing its focus to online e-commerce according to a Also read: Accusations Fly as Classic Core Debate Goes Corporate report from Business Insider. The company believes its efforts towards this goal is a necessary step to broaden its horizons.

item.title: Messaging app Vodi using BitPay to accept bitcoin payments
item.description:
Messaging app Vodi using BitPay to accept bitcoin payments

Bitcoin payment processor BitPay announced on its corporate blog Monday a partnership with international mobile messaging app Vodi to integrate bitcoin payments. Available for both Android and iOS ...
